RDNTLG.​Command.​ArgumentsParser
public
RDNTLG.​Command.​ArgumentsParser

Parse arguments.

Creating a new ArgumentsParser without supplying any arguments will use the "Environment Command Line Args" instead.

Only available under the RDNTLG_CCM/UNITY_EDITOR preprocessor definitions.

Example

-param value -param "value" /param:"value" /param=value -param5 'value'

Variables
parameters
private readonly StringDictionary parameters

_param

}

Retrieve a parameter value if it exists.
